Posts.Content: Sep 26, 2018 09:10AM Sunshine89 wrote: Helloo Teresa, I am so sorry you are dealing with this shit... i was diagnosed at age of 25 in 2014 (stage 1) and in 2018 (stage 3) reccurance.. 6 months after i got married.
